name: Gunlocked (itch)
description:
Forget about playing this game stealthily: shooting is now forced-on!

You are in the Gas Containment Facility, looking for portable tanks filled with compressed polyhectane: a valuable, energy rich fuel. Suddenly, after eliminating several security sentinels, your gun locks up and can no longer stop firing. An alarm goes off and you are left with no choice to escape the facility as quickly as possible.

Controls
  • WASD / Left thumbstick to move
  • Mouse / Right thumbstick to aim
  • Left click / Right trigger to sho.... oh, wait.
  • Reset progress with ALT + DELETE (debugging tool is now a feature :3)
  • Exit the game with ALT + F4 (thanks, I know I am)
